message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GT 

This paper deals with optimization problems in search-based advertising, which involves using algorithms to determine the best way to bid on keywords in order to maximize return on investment. This topic is closely related to information retrieval (cs.IR), as it involves analyzing search queries and determining which keywords are most likely to be profitable. It also involves data structures (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques for modeling and predicting user behavior. Additionally, the paper discusses optimization algorithms (cs.AI) and game theory (cs.GT) for finding the best bidding strategies.
